text: Hrdy 7ey TrHf 4ferro Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 577 /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 (Ma Raa7, wacr Qav7 3 (iT #3T4) QH. /Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 M# National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) #-5 Q 6, #ae-10, ETat, # farzi-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No NHAIMC-IIPHASE VJLAJAIPUBY3D) /2009] 144 & dt 30.09.2009 CRCULAR Sub: Proposals pertaining to Land Acquisition for various projects Sir In connection.with the subject matter it may kindly be that utmost priority needs To be given T0 the Land Acquisition matters With respect t0-YOHr jurisdiction As already  informed, the` land acquisition_process shall be monitored at thehighest levels In this regard, to fasfen smoothen the process, the Competent Authority has already decided that the matters related to the land will be directly sent to LA division by the concerned Project Directors thru' the respective CGM; Regional Office to avoid undue delay: All PD' s are therefore advised to ensure strict compliance of the directions of Competent , Authority in this   regard and   proposals for publication of notification etc not be sent to the technical divisions in HQ (S.
